data.title: Platinum Equity, The Largest Private Companies
data.meta_description: Platinum Equity ranked 18 among The Largest Private Companies In 2005
data.text:
2004 Revenues Revenue Change Employees Fiscal Year End $8 bil2 77.8% 45,000 Dec

Founded in 1995, Platinum Equity specializes in acquiring and operating distressed technology and non-technology businesses throughout the world. Platinum Equity's portfolio companies are primarily mission-critical service and solutions providers. The company focuses on acquisitions in communications equipment and services, software, telecommunications services, healthcare distribution, insurance services, logistics services and chemical manufacturing The Platinum Equity portfolio is comprised of 21 wholly owned businesses, with over 45,000 employees serving more than 600,000 customer sites.
